relationships.description: Harry and Ron are heading upstairs together, as described in the text: 'Harry and Ron headed upstairs...'
Harry's laughter is a response to Malfoy's obvious rage and confusion, as described in the text: 'smothering their laughter at Malfoy’s obvious rage and confusion'.
Ron's laughter is also a response to Malfoy's obvious rage and confusion, as described in the text: 'smothering their laughter at Malfoy’s obvious rage and confusion'.
